mapper.select: SELECT A.BTITLE btitle, A.BCONTENT bcontent, A.BNO bno, C.CBIMG cbimg FROM BOARD A JOIN KINDOFBOARD B ON (A.KBNO = B.KBNO) JOIN CATEGORYBOARD C ON (B.KBNO = C.KBNO) WHERE A.MNO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE MNO = #{userNo}
SELECT B.BTITLE, A.RCONTENT, A.BNO, D.CBIMG FROM REPLY A JOIN BOARD B ON (A.BNO = B.BNO) JOIN KINDOFBOARD C ON (B.KBNO = B.KBNO) JOIN CATEGORYBOARD D ON (C.KBNO=D.KBNO) WHERE A.MNO = #{userNo}

SELECT A.BNO, A.BTITLE, A.BCONTENT, C.CBIMG FROM BOARD A JOIN KINDOFBOARD B ON (A.KBNO = B.KBNO) JOIN CATEGORYBOARD C ON (B.KBNO = C.KBNO) JOIN BOOKCATEGORY D ON (C.CBNO = D.CBNO) JOIN BOOKMARK E ON (D.BNO = E.BNO) WHERE E.MNO = #{userrNo}
